DOC.brief_summary: The goal project develop biomarker - Connective Tissue Motion Measure ( CTMM ) -quantifying functional behavior perimuscular connective tissue .
DOC.detailed_description: The differential motion specific connective tissue stratum measure tissue displacement ( linear oscillation ) initiate computer-controlled needle stimulus tool ( NST ) . The CTMM suitable outcome measure mechanistic clinical study CAM intervention . The CTMM also potentially serve clinical diagnostic treatment-monitoring tool manual therapist , acupuncturists , CAM clinicians interested assess functional status patient 's connective tissue .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion LBP subject : history recurrent chronic LBP minimum 12 month ability stand walk without assistance ability understand read English ability understand sign consent form Inclusion criterion NoLBP subject : history low back pain chronic pain limited activity daily live work numerical current pain index less 0.5 . Exclusion Criteria subject : previous severe back low extremity injury surgery major structural spinal deformity ( scoliosis , kyphosis , stenosis ) ankylose spondylitis rheumatoid arthritis neurological deficit ( weakness and/or sensory loss , decrease deep tendon reflex suggest nerve root compression , subjective symptom nerve root irritation ( sciatica ) neurological major psychiatric disorder bleed disorder corticosteroid anticoagulant medication pregnancy worker 's compensation disability case litigation LBP problem acute systemic infection BMI le 21 great 35
